oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de Visite of an unidentified lieutenant
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This officer is most likley a member of the 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. It is back marked J.H. Van Stavorens, Metropolitan Gallery, 53 College St., Nashville, Tenn. The lieutenant is wearing an officer's sword belt, and holds an officer's model US cavarly saber in his gauntleted hand.
